task.description: Setup automated code formatting to ensure consistent code style across the project. Configure either Google Java Format or Spotless with a standard formatter.

acceptance-criteria.criterion: Formatter plugin configured in parent POM
Format check runs during verify phase
Format can be applied with mvn command
EditorConfig file created for IDE support

implementation-notes.note: Recommended: Use maven-spotless-plugin with Google Java Format
Add plugin configuration to parent POM pluginManagement section
Configure to run 'spotless:check' during verify phase
Provide 'mvn spotless:apply' command to auto-format code
Create .editorconfig file for IDE support: - indent_style = space - indent_size = 4 - charset = utf-8 - trim_trailing_whitespace = true

testing-requirements.requirement: Create a test Java file and verify 'mvn spotless:apply' formats it
